## vision\_v1.Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p3beta1CropHint interface

Single crop hint that is used to generate a new crop when serving an image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p3beta1CropHint 
```
